<p id="last-updated" style="font-style: italic; font-size: 0.9em;"></p>
 
<script>
  const today = new Date();
  document.getElementById("last-updated").innerText = 
    `Last updated: ${today.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}`;
</script>
